import React, { Component } from "react"; class SupplierBidDetails extends Component { state = { tender: null }; async componentDidMount() { if (!this.props.tenderId) return; try { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/supplier/myBidDetails/${this.props.tenderId}` ); this.setState({ tender: data.bid }); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.message); return; } } render() { return (
